DOC.HEADLINE: BRIEFLY ; EDUCATION : LMU STUDENT WINS GRANT
DOC.TEXT: Dennis Metro , a senior history major at Loyola Marymount University in Westchester , has been awarded a National Security Education Undergraduate Scholarship Program grant to study in Hungary . Metro , 22 , received the grant from the Institute of International Education . He will attend political_science and Russian and Hungarian language classes at Janus Pannonius Tudomanyos Egyetem , a university in Pecs , Hungary , during the 1994-95 academic_year . The program was created to help Americans better understand foreign cultures .
